About Me

BIO

I am from Meerut. I currently pursuing b.tech in computer science branch from Meerut institute of engineering technology. My area of interest is to become a full-stack java development && competitive coding logical reasoning. I am Strong in design and integration with intuitive problem-solving skills. Proficient in JAVA, HTML, CSS, JAVASCRIPT, and SQL. Passionate about implementing and launching new projects. Looking to start the career as an entry-level software engineer with a reputed company.
